name: CrowdStrike Falcon Identity Protection
description:
Fetches users and their respective scores from the CrowdStrike Falcon Identity Protection platform.

 URE score calculation => |(1 - (CrowdStrike Falcon Identity Protection Risk Score))|*1000

configuration.label: Base URL
configuration.description: Base URL of CrowdStrike instance. e.g. https://api.crowdstrike.com

configuration.label: Client ID
configuration.description: Client ID generated from the CrowdStrike platform.

configuration.label: Client Secret
configuration.description: Client Secret generated from the CrowdStrike platform.

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the data for the initial run.
